name: Compel Tongue
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Black Markets © 2015, Paizo Inc.
components: V, S, M (a wooden block carved with a letter)
text: This spell functions as share language, granting a creature the ability to read, understand, and communicate to the best of its ability in any one language you know. For the spell's entire duration, the target can speak and write only in the language imparted, but its ability to understand other languages is unaffected.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一个木头雕刻，上有一个字母)
text_zh: 此法术如同共享语言(share language)一般作用，授予一个生物任何一种你所知道的语言的阅读，理解和沟通的能力。在该法术的持续时间内，目标只能用所授予的语言说和写，但理解其他语言的能力并不受影响。
